name: five pin bow sight
description: A set of adjustable optic fibre aiming pins with a bracket to mount on modern bows. Improves accuracy substantially, but takes a bit longer to line up.

name: single pin bow sight
description: A single aluminum pin with a bracket to mount on modern bows. Quick to use, but not very accurate.

name: bow scope
description: A single magnifying scope mounted on an adjustable bracket, with accompanying clarifier peep sight. Designed for extra long shots, but easily adjusted for short range. Spectacularly accurate.

name: bow stabilizer set
description: A set of three long stabilizing rods with a spring-loaded bracket to mount on modern bows. Takes extra time to set up when wielding, but doesn't take much extra space.

name: aftermarket bow limbs
description: A set of competition-grade composite replacement bow and crossbow limbs, to squeeze out some extra energy during your draw. It even has a super-cool decal running down the limbs.

name: high-quality bow string
description: A strong and precise polymer string for a bow or crossbow. Helps to keep the bow constant, and retain as much energy as possible. Oddly enough, it's even your favourite color!

name: adjustable bow riser
description: A precision machined superalloy riser, with enough dials to tune it to your exact liking. It even has cool engravings, and feels surprisingly warm and comfortable in your hand.

name: performance bow cams
description: A set of precision machined shaped cams, with a dial to tune it to your exact draw. The spokes even make a cool pattern.

name: bow dampening kit
description: A set of simple pads and strips of fur or rubber with adhesive backing, designed to stick on the limbs and string of a bow to absorb vibrations. This substantially reduces noise during firing and can help with accuracy.
